name: Bounce (itch) (Brity)
description:
Description

Bounce is a platformer game, where the ball never stops bouncing. As you progress through the levels you will unlock new abilities and balls which will help you complete the more difficult levels.

Features

Here are some of the features that are in the game:

  • walking enemies
  • bouncing enemies
  • double jump
  • power up that increases bounce height
  • power up that makes the ball invincible
  • bouncepad
  • platform with limited amount of bounces
  • 3 different levels
  • level select screen
  • sounds

Made by: Jan E K, Hanna M M, Hans M
